description: Move 'Kodin energiavinkit' section below clock chart and add 30-day average differentials to appliance cost calculators

tasks.title: Add 30-day differential to appliance calculator methods
tasks.description: In SpotPrice.php, add 'diff_from_30d_percent' to the return arrays of: calculateSaunaCost(), calculateLaundryCost(), calculateDishwasherCost(), calculateWaterHeaterCost(), and getBestConsecutiveHours(). Calculate as: (($cheapestPrice * 1.255 - $this->rolling30DayAvgWithVat) / $this->rolling30DayAvgWithVat) * 100. Round to 1 decimal place.

tasks.title: Move Kodin energiavinkit section below clock chart
tasks.description: In spot-price.blade.php, cut the entire 'Kodin energiavinkit' section (currently around lines 503-672) and move it to appear directly after the clock chart section (around line 66). The new page order should be: Hero, Current Price Card, Clock Chart, Kodin energiavinkit, Price Comparison Cards, Horizontal Bar Chart, etc.

tasks.title: Add differential badges to appliance cards
tasks.description: In spot-price.blade.php, add a badge below the recommended time in each appliance card showing comparison to 30-day average. Badge should be: green 'X% halvempi kuin 30 pv keskiarvo' if >5% below, yellow 'Lähellä 30 pv keskiarvoa' if within ±5%, red 'X% kalliimpi kuin 30 pv keskiarvo' if >5% above. Add down arrow icon for green, up arrow for red. Apply to: EV Charging, Sauna, Laundry, Dishwasher, Water heater cards.

tasks.title: Build and verify changes
tasks.description: Run 'cd laravel && npm run build'. Verify: 1) Kodin energiavinkit appears directly below clock chart, 2) Each appliance card shows a differential badge with correct color coding, 3) Badges show correct percentages compared to 30-day average. Create git commit with all changes.
